name: Dark World Burger (3MinuteFlips)
description:
The world you know is long gone, and from the ashes of modern society rises a world completely devoid of life as we know it. Our greed gave birth to consumption, our flesh gave birth to meat. Five totems of consumption oversee the wastelands, competition over who truly holds the ultimate throne. All that remains of a world that once was is a near-parody of the gluttonous world we used to know; there are only two kinds of people: those who prepare versus those who consume, those who make versus those who eat. You were born of this world, formed to suit its purpose. But there's something different about you. And you know it, don't you?

Create. Serve. Kill. Survive.

Welcome to Dark World Burger.

------------------------------------------

If the game crashes consistently, try downloading our Windows executable instead!
